CustomField.description: Overrides the user level locale for an organization. If blank, user locale is used. Format must be provided in [ language ]-[ territory ] format, for example en-US.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overrides the user level locale for an organization. If blank, user locale is used. Format must be provided in [ language ]-[ territory ] format, for example en-US.
CustomField.label: Locale Override
